item.title: Hassett's Fed chair candidacy received pushback from high-level people close to Trump, sources say
item.description: There's concern that the National Economic Council director is too close to the president.

item.title: Stocks making the biggest moves premarket: iRobot, Las Vegas Sands, Tilray & more
item.description: These are the stocks posting the largest moves in premarket trading.

item.title: U.S.-China soybean tussle reveals Beijing’s food security strategy. Goldman Sachs on how to invest
item.description: China's focus on food security mirrors efforts for self-sufficiency in chips and energy, Goldman Sachs said.

item.title: Goldman Sachs makes big bet on ETFs specializing in downside protection
item.description: Goldman Sachs Asset Management is making a big bet on defined outcome exchange-traded funds — which use options to help protect against market losses.
